title: Bitcoin illiquid supply hits all-time high reaching 15.3 million BTC
description:
Quick Take The Bitcoin market is currently witnessing pivotal changes in its liquidity dynamics. With the illiquid supply reaching an all-time high at 15.3 million BTC, representing approximately 78% of the Bitcoin circulating supply, it suggests a growing pool of holders committed to their long-term Bitcoin investments. Concurrently, the liquid supply has retraced to 2012 […]

The post Bitcoin illiquid supply hits all-time high reaching 15.3 million BTC appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Nerayoff claims no ceiling for XRP’s financial reach
description: Steven Nerayoff, a prominent figure in the cryptocurrency sphere and former Ethereum advisor, recently voiced a compelling perspective on the potential growth of XRP, a digital currency by Ripple. title: Taiwan officially advances crypto bill
description: The Virtual Asset Management Bill lays the foundation for categorizing virtual assets and outlining the operational guidelines for exchanges within the country. On Oct. 25, legislators in Taiwan introduced a Virtual Asset Management Bill to the Legislative Yuan, the country’s…

title: Australia stopped using cash, who will continue to enforce CBDCs?
description:
While cash has long been a staple of economies worldwide, technological advancements and the increasing popularity of cryptocurrencies are reshaping the way we conduct financial transactions. In this article, we’ll explore which countries are no longer accepting cash, where they are in the process, and the role Central Bank Digital Currencies (CBDCs) play in driving […]

The post Australia stopped using cash, who will continue to enforce CBDCs? appeared first on Altcoin Buzz.

title: FLOKI Price Up 24+% Following TokenFi Launch Announcement
description:
Floki’s (FLOKI) price surged throughout the past day after the project’s team announced on X yesterday that Floki has launched a cryptocurrency and asset tokenization platform named TokenFi. It seems like the project is looking to take advantage of the multi-trillion-dollar tokenization sector. The tokenization industry is predicted to reach $16 trillion by 2023. Even […]

The post FLOKI Price Up 24+% Following TokenFi Launch Announcement appeared first on Coin Edition.
